import "./App.css"; import { Link, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { getAll, update } from "./BooksAPI"; function MainPage() { const [allShelfBook, setAllShelfBook] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const dogetAllShelfBooks = async () =>{ const res = await getAll(); setAllShelfBook(res); }; dogetAllShelfBooks(); }, []) const handleChange = (event,book) => { const doUpdateShelfBook = async (book,shelf) => { const res = await update(book,shelf); console.log(res); } if (event.target.value !== 'none') { doUpdateShelfBook(book,event.target.value); } } return (

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'currentlyReading').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}

Want to Read

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'wantToRead').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}

Read

    {allShelfBook.filter((bookShelf) => bookShelf.shelf === 'read').map((book) =>
  1. {book.title}
    {book.authors}
    2. )}
Add a book
); } export default MainPage;
